divs: Sighting Detailsufo like orbs were what looked like in a line,thought they were stars and then they moved around and came closer and got bigger and brighter then disapeared after 4 minutes, they were orange and some were white, brightened like a flame would,flickered and moved around in s shapes and then got smaller and smaller and disapeared. I was driving at the time and what made me notice it was the stars were not showing and there were 6 in a row that i thought at first were stars and then they started moving around and got closer and brighter and would hover in one spot here and there and then move around again
Summary: 6 Ufo's mimicking line of the big dipper then move around and disapear
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There was one other sighting in Edmonton on or around November 23rd 2012
